work.name: UNESCO
work.position: Member of the UNESCO student council at UNESCO-school Christelijk Gymnasium Utrecht
work.summary: I was a member of my school's UNESCO group for almost two years, including time as treasurer. We organised events such as dinners for refugees, collecting food for the food bank and after a 24-hour fast, raising money for climate-change induced famine, we were invited to Brussels alongside representatives from a humanitarian aid and lobbying organisation, World Vision. There, we lobbied with the MEPs Mohammed Chahim (EUs Socialists & Democrats vice president) and Bas Eickhout (lead candidate (spitzenkandidat) for the European Green Party).
